extendedInfo.description: Fancy JigSaw is a classic puzzle game. Drag the painting pieces to the right place to re-establish the full picture. Don't sweat it if you are unable to solve the puzzle easily. You can use the peek button to preview the original image.There are 100 levels in this game. The further you advance, the more challenging the puzzle becomes. This app also allows you to save the painting images to your SD .This application provides the high quality famous paintings. Cognitive app â Fancy Jigsaw:Paintingâ will make you acquainted with the paintings of European artists who performed in various styles.Cool Features Include:- More than 100 pictures of painting- Multiple difficulty levels (from 3*3 to the most difficult 7*7).- Save to phone album function.- Images gallery and difficulty selection.Fancy JigSaw is suitable for a wide range of audiences, Many different modes and pictures in the game will keep you excited and entertained for a long time.Keywords:puzzle,puzzles,Jigsaw,games,brainfun,funny,Artists ,Oil Painting Masterï¼painting puzzle,entertainment,wallpapers,animal,nature.

reviews.title: It was fun
reviews.comment: It was fun, but had it 3 days and have every pic memorized. Needs more....a lot more.....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s brilliant.
reviews.comment: It\'s brilliant. I can never had enough of it or get bored. I highly recommend to install it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I love this game!
reviews.comment: Great way to pass time...some details hard to see bc so much going on a little screen, but overall great job
